summary: Changes Stormcloak soldiers to look more viking-ish. Pretty lorefriendly as well!
descriptionHtml:
This mod will change the stormcloak & stormcloak officer armors into viking-style armors as well as give them viking-style shields. Galmor will gain a viking-style battleaxe in the vanilla version, and a full new armor set in the dawnguard version.

The only difference in the dawnguard version is Galmors armor. If you prefer he look like the other stormcloak officers, just get the vanilla version, Galmors armor is the only difference.

THIS MOD HAS NO EFFECT ON ULFRIC STORMCLOAK! All your ulfric armor replacers are safe! :)

THIS IS ONLY AN ESP! NO MESHES/TEXTURES INCLUDED!!!
I did not get permission to use any of the armors in this mod, as this is just a personal mod I decided to release, so you will need ALL of these mods to make it work, without them, this mod won't change anything, except possibly crash your game or cause all of the stormcloaks to be nude.

If you get the dawnguard version, keep an eye on the isen wiht armor, as the mod author is currently having someone retexture the armor to make it look better.


REQUIREMENTS:

Vanilla Version - 
[url="http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30647/?"]Norse Viking Armor[/url]
[url="http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092//?"]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url]
[url="http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31002/?"]Insanitys Shields[/url]
[url="http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26634/?"]Viking Weapons of Midgaurder[/url]

Dawnguard Version -
All of the above+ [url="http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46489//?"]Armor of the Isen Wiht[/url]
author: Saint Grimm
